monsters.name: Goblin
monsters.description: Goblins are small, black-hearted humanoids that lair in despoiled dungeons and other dismal settings. Individually weak, they gather in large numbers to torment other creatures.

monsters.name: Red Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.description: The odor of sulfur and pumice surrounds a red dragon, whose swept-back horns and spinal frill define its silhouette. Its beaked snout vents smoke at all times, and its eyes dance with flame when it is angry.

monsters.name: Cloud Giant
monsters.description: Cloud giants live extravagant lives high above the world, showing little concern for the plights of other races except as amusement. They are muscular with light skin and have hair of silver or blue.

monsters.name: Phase Spider
monsters.description: A phase Spider possesses the magical ability to phase in and out of the Ethereal Plane. It seems to appear out of nowhere and quickly vanishes after attacking. Its Movement on the Ethereal Plane before coming back to The Material Plane makes it seem like it can Teleport.

monsters.name: Giggle Pig
monsters.description: A pig that giggles if you are more than 5' from it

campaigns.name: Sword Coast Adventures
campaigns.description: First campaign with Jake, Felix, Alex and Matt. Set in the Sword Coast with characters Raskas, Alan (Stealth Killer), Sherlock and Polydeuces.

campaigns.name: Jungles of Chult
campaigns.description: Jakes game with Kepesk @Stuart, Thea @Alex, Glee @Felix and Hazrah @Matt.

adventures.name: Goblin Arrows
adventures.description: The party are waylaid on the road to Phandalin and discover their employer has been kidnapped.

adventures.name: Redbrands in Town
adventures.description: Things in town are not all well. The can discover that the bad guys are linked to the the kidnapping of Gundren.

adventures.name: Spiders Web
adventures.description: The party explore the local area and try to find clues as to the whereabouts of Gundren and the Black Spider.

adventures.name: Island - Street Brawl
adventures.description: The party get attacked by some street thugs

encounters.name: Ambush on the Tribor Trail
encounters.description: The party are waylaid on the road to Phandalin by a goblin ambush.

encounters.name: Cave entrance
encounters.description: The goblin cave entrance has another ambush.

encounters.name: Wolf lair
encounters.description: Wolves are chained up in this cave. They can be pacified or are likely to break free and attack.
